plugin.name: Image Transforms
plugin.author: George
plugin.description: Comprehensive image transformation tools for FLIKA including rotation, flipping, intensity operations, and spatial manipulations optimized for TIRF microscopy.
plugin.long_description: Image Transforms provides a complete suite of geometric and intensity transformation operations for FLIKA image stacks. Features include 90-degree and custom angle rotations, horizontal/vertical flips, transposition, intensity inversion and normalization, pixel binning, image padding, and cropping tools. All operations preserve the original window option and work seamlessly with multi-frame stacks, making them ideal for TIRF microscopy recordings and other experimental imaging applications.
